about_the_game:
Check out the pre-release for Yoko Redux: Dreams of a Blue Planet.

In this demo, familiarize yourself with the world of Yoko Redux while you follow along with Locke as he solves one of his first mysteries. But in this world, answers only lead to more questions.

Sit back and take a ride, but beware, this cruise down the rabbit hole will only leave you wanting more.

Lucky for you, the wait won't be long.
detailed_description:
Check out the pre-release for Yoko Redux: Dreams of a Blue Planet.

In this demo, familiarize yourself with the world of Yoko Redux while you follow along with Locke as he solves one of his first mysteries. But in this world, answers only lead to more questions.

Sit back and take a ride, but beware, this cruise down the rabbit hole will only leave you wanting more.

Lucky for you, the wait won't be long.

fullgame.name: Yoko Redux: Dreams of a Blue Planet

name: Yoko Redux: Dreams Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: 1.8Ghz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews:
“Super cool game. I did of course immediately die because I will use it, dammit! Absolutely love the aesthetic, humor, and intriguing story:) can't wait to play the full game! Also mad props to the voice actor”
Chronic Vagrant
short_description: A corrupted city. A mysterious message. A dangerous heist. The contact implied the job will be easy. It never is. Yoko Redux is a 3D cyberpunk noir point & click adventure, fully voiced acted in five glorious colors (including red!).
